scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run supabase" "npm run frontend" "npm run backend" --names "SUPABASE,ANGULAR,FASTAPI" --prefix-colors "green,cyan,magenta"
scripts.dev:stop: bash -c 'pkill -f "ng serve" || true; pkill -f "uvicorn" || true; echo "✓ Stopped Angular and FastAPI"'
scripts.dev:stop:all: bash -c 'pkill -f "ng serve" || true; pkill -f "uvicorn" || true; cd backend && npx supabase stop; echo "✓ Stopped all services"'
